meanings.definition: The quality of being finicky or overly particular about small details.
meanings.sent1: Her finicalness when it comes to choosing the perfect gift can be exhausting.
meanings.sent2: His finicalness with his appearance often leads to him spending hours in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent3: The cat's finicalness in only eating a certain brand of food is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The artist's finicalness with each brushstroke turned the painting into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The finicalness of the chef in selecting the freshest ingredients made the dish unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state of being excessively concerned with trivial matters.
meanings.sent1: Her finicalness over minor details often causes delays in the project.
meanings.sent2: His finicalness about the font size on the presentation slides is unnecessary.
meanings.sent3: The team's finicalness over the color of the logo became a running joke in the office.
meanings.sent4: The politician's finicalness about his tie matching his socks seemed comical to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's finicalness about pencil sharpening distracted the students from learning.

meanings.definition: Excessive attention to detail or precision.
meanings.sent1: The architect's finicalness in measuring each angle ensured the building's stability.
meanings.sent2: Her finicalness in organizing her desk made it impossible to find anything quickly.
meanings.sent3: The detective's finicalness in examining the evidence led to solving the case.
meanings.sent4: The tailor's finicalness in stitching every seam perfectly impressed his clients.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's finicalness in recording data accurately was crucial for the experiment's success.
